name: MYKB
blurb: MYKB is a file system/markdown based knowledge base editor/viewer. MYKB helps manage personal markdown based docs in a webui with automatic git committing.

name: SDS Research Fund
blurb: SDS Research Fund is a non-profit that hopes to increase the funds being raised for research towards a cure for Shwachman Diamond Syndrome.

name: STUDENTLIFE
blurb: STUDENTLIFE is a school based social network to get updated on news from other students and teachers, and to access opportunities and resources.

name: Countdowns
blurb: Countdowns is a customizable countdowns app that helps you keep track of the amount of time until a certain date.
